column1:
Select Swatches behavior when hover over them.
Display tooltip on hover over the swatches from Layered Navigation and from the products on category page.
column2:
Select Swatches behavior when hover over them.
Display tooltip on hover over the swatches from Layered Navigation and from the products on category page.

column1:
You need to add or set an existing hover image for your products. For this, on the Admin menu select Catalog -> Products ->
                        Edit a product -> Go to Images and Videos section -> add new images or set an
                        existing image to be the hover image, by clicking the image and settings the Role of the image to be Listing Hover Image
column2:
You need to add or set an existing hover image for your products. For this, on the Admin menu select Catalog -> Products ->
                        Edit a product -> Go to Images and Videos section -> add new images or set an
                        existing image to be the hover image, by clicking the image and settings the Role of the image to be Listing Hover Image

column1: Enable/Disable hover image over items on category page. See tooltip for more details.
column2: Enable/Disable hover image over items on category page. See tooltip for more details.
